text:
Kevin McCarthy is pissed because the Dems want to include funding for mail-in voting in the next coronavirus relief bill. He says Democrats are attempting to use the pandemic “for their political benefit.” So being able to vote is a “political benefit”?🙄
https://t.co/iJu2QI2yMn

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
